grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 怠慢【タイマン】negligence, neglect, carelessness, procrastination
滞納【タイノウ】falling behind (with a payment), being in arrears, non-payment, default, delinquency
懈怠【ケタイ】laziness, indolence, negligence (of duties), misfeasance, nonfeasance, negligence, laches, kausidya
kun reading compounds: 怠る【おこたる】to be negligent in doing something, to shirk, to be off one's guard
怠ける【なまける】to be idle, to slacken, to neglect (e.g. one's work)
